name: Elekid
author: TOKIYA
flavor_text: Even in the most vicious storm, this Pokémon plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.

poke_body.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
poke_body.effect: As long as Elekid is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Elekid by attacks.

attacks.name: Sparking Ball
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. Elekid is now Asleep.
